verbs.description: In [ARG1: an interview with Reuters] [V: published] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] , Pope Francis on Sunday castigated President Donald Trump over his administration ’s practice of separating migrant children from their parents at the border , saying “ populism is not the solution . ”
